name: Updater Journey
description:
UPDATER - A Jumpy journey

  Commander Fura-i is speaking, the Furafura spacecraft had been corrupted. I have launched the Updater procedure. You are the Updater! 

  You will embody a cat cube (because cats are cute) in a 2.5D cyber world, face abnormal platform structure and viruses, then save the Core from its corruption. Remember, Lanterns are checkpoints. Activate them to save your progression.

Except for the main menu, the music has been composed and mixed by the artist REO, a super hyper cool friend. Go check his channel here.
